a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Learning-adjusted years of schooling merge the quantity and quality of education into one metric, accounting for
the fact that similar durations of schooling can yield different learning outcomes.
Data source: World Bank (2023); World Bank's, World Bank Analytical Classifications (2017); UN, World Population Prospects (2022)
